review:
I have had allergies for more than 10 years but I was able to relatively control it. I recently moved to hyderabad and it got really bad. I used to wake up most days with my nose blocked and the same used to happen when I went out. 
I contacted a couple of doctors online but the allegies would always return. My friend suggested I consult with Dr. Naveen. He explained me indepth on why the allergies were occuring and what course of action we will be taking to get it under control. He was really patient and answered all my questions. After couple of consultations we were able to get the right dose and now my allergies are completely under control. I would like to thank Dr. Naveen and would recommend like to recommend him.
reply_text: Thank u!!!

review: Dr. Naveen has been really great in communicating the status about my mom on a very regular basis. During these unprecedented times, unfortunately both my Mom and Dad are effected by covid, in spite of his busy schedule Dr.Naveen had been very patient in talking to me and explaining my Mom's condition in detail. It really reflects his level of professionalism and dedication towards what he does as the front line worker. Thank you very much for being so patient and understanding the needs of the people.
reply_text: Thank u for the valuable feedback.

review: hi I'm mayuri, few months back I had some symptoms like weight loss, excessive hair fall, fatigue and general weakness I also have a small lump in my neck, i have visited atleast 3 doctors before I saw dr.naveen none of them could diagnose my condition but dr.naveen listened to my symptoms keenly and patiently, examined the neck mass and suspecting hashimoto thyroiditis recommended some tests and he was correct regarding my diagnosis infact it came out to be hashimoto thyroiditis, he treated me accordingly.* **** ********* *** **** ********* ** *** ****** Now I feel much better my weakness has decreased even my hairfall has reduced. I had a very pleasant experience with the doctor and I would highly recommend this doctor for others. Thank you dr.naveen.
reply_text: Thank u for your valuable feedback!!!
